name: Infinite_Buffer_Chest
title: Infinite Buffer Chest
description: An expensive small 1x1 chest that can hold a near infinite amount of items (65530 slots=33mil iron ores=65 mil iron plates=131mil steel plates). Good for being used as a buffer for ores. If you want a big 6x6 version (~1800 slot storage), look up the warehouse mod
author: llVIU
